item.title: Create a NuGet package
item.description: Whether you are working alone or in a company, duplicating code is never a good practice. It is one of the first rules in computer science: when you create something, you reuse it, consolidate it, but avoid recreating it, except in rare cases. Our goal here is to create reusable libraries that can be easily integrated into any project or other library. We will not address the issue of code obfuscation here.
